mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.MENTORING_NAME, C.CART_START, C.CART_END, C.CART_PRICE, C.ID, C.MENTOR_ID, M.MENTORING_NUMBER "mtNum.mentoring_number" FROM CART C, MENTORING M WHERE C.MENTOR_ID = M.MENTOR_ID AND C.MENTORING_NAME = M.MENTORING_NAME ORDER BY C.CART_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO, MENTORING_NAME, CART_START, CART_END, CART_PRICE, ID, MENTOR_ID) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CART_NO), 0) + 1 FROM CART), #{mentoring_name}, TO_DATE(#{cart_start}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), TO_DATE(#{cart_end}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{cart_price}, #{id}, #{mentor_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT CART_NO, MENTORING_NAME, CART_START, CART_END, CART_PRICE, ID, MENTOR_ID FROM CART WHERE CART_NO = ${cart_no}
